name: Alone (itch) (Warped Imagination)
description:
Escape room VR game .. with a twist!

Made as an entry for "VR Jan Jam" where the theme of this jam was "Escape Room".

This was a solo effort by myself and was created in under 72 hours (actually spent a lot less because life gets in the way).

Assets wise you may recognize the hands as I took the basic avatar from Mixamo https://www.mixamo.com/ , ripped them off the avatar and re-rigged them.

Other than that the only other downloaded assets were the wall textures taken from Ambient CG https://ambientcg.com/.

So lets talk gameplay:

You stand in a small room with no apparent way out .. an unknown source asks you questions that you answer by raising your hand .. without spoiling too much .. is answering the questions how you escape!

If you enjoyed this game then check out my other content on my YouTube channel https://www.youtube.com/c/WarpedImagination
